PROTECT YOUR TIMELINE.

Every reconstruction carries risk. A misremembered lampshade color can cascade into a full identity fracture. Butterfly Effect Insurance™ covers paradox liability, furniture-accuracy disputes, and unauthorized emotional bleed-through for up to 180 days post-immersion.

Plans starting at 200 TC/month. Because you can't sue the past, but you can insure against it.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS — BUTTERFLY EFFECT INSURANCE™ (Rev. 47.3b)

1. Coverage extends to paradox events of Category 3 or below. Category 4+ paradoxes (defined as "events in which the insured party ceases to have existed") are not covered and are considered an act of timeline.

2. Furniture-accuracy disputes must be filed within 72 hours of capsule immersion. Disputes regarding the BILLY vs. KALLAX distinction are subject to the IKEA Arbitration Protocol (Appendix F) and may require on-site bookshelf measurement by a certified Temporal Surveyor.

3. The insured acknowledges that emotional bleed-through — defined as "the persistent sensation that a reconstructed moment was more real than the original" — is a known side effect and not grounds for a claim.

4. RewindYourLife.biz is not responsible for timeline branches initiated by Anya Sharma, ChronoHeist.net, or any affiliated unauthorized temporal redistributor. Capsules accessed through black-market raw-timeline feeds are void of all warranty, insurance, and emotional support.

5. In the event that a reconstruction causes the insured to "feel worse, not better" (Form 77-B, Section 4.2), RewindYourLife.biz will provide one (1) complimentary capsule of a mildly pleasant Tuesday with no emotional significance, redeemable within 90 days.

6. The phrase "I just want to go back" does not constitute a legally binding reconstruction request, regardless of how many times it is spoken into the intake microphone between 2:00 AM and 4:00 AM.

7. Paradox liability for pets is capped at 500 TC per animal. This cap was established following the 2044 "Three Biscuits Incident" and is non-negotiable.

8. RewindYourLife.biz reserves the right to modify these terms at any point in the past, present, or future. The insured will be notified retroactively.
